summary:
Atsuko Sato - Doge and Neiro 🧡
Sato is a project that honors Atsuko Sato herself, the compassionate heart behind the iconic Dogecoin and Neiro. While many tokens are built on the fame of her pets, SATO focuses on the woman who made it all possible. Atsuko’s life is a testament to the power of love and kindness, and SATO is a way for the world to give back, ensuring her legacy of compassion endures.
As the project grows, SATO will make meaningful donations to community-chosen charities in Atsuko’s name, continuing her spirit of compassion to inspire and make a difference.
